pythagoras.f

Class AbstractCircle

  • java.lang.Object
    • pythagoras.f.AbstractCircle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICircle
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle

    public abstract class AbstractCircle
extends Object
implements ICircle
    Provides most of the implementation of ICircle, obtaining only the location and radius from the derived class.
